General.Name: Melhus Sparebank
General.Description: Melhus Sparebank, a savings bank, provides various banking products and services to companies, agriculture customers, and private individuals in Norway. The company offers savings accounts; construction and business loans; bank guarantee, overdraft, and leasing services; and credit and bank cards. It also provides various insurance products for liability, health, personnel, occupational injury, travel, accident, business, store, data attack, property damage, craftsman, homeowners, office, vehicle, and farms; savings and pension products; payment services; and online and mobile banking services. The company operates through branch offices in central Trondheim, Heimdal, Ler, and Korsvegen. Melhus Sparebank was founded in 1840 and is headquartered in Melhus, Norway.
